paragraphs.text:
val list3 = List("Zimbabwe","Kenya").map(item=>(item,"NA"))
val list0 = List("Bangladesh","Afganisthan","Irlend").map(item =>(item,"NR"))
val list1 = List("India","Pakistan","Srilanka","Australia","England","SouthAfrica","WestIndies","Newzeland")
val list2 = List("India","Newzeland","England","Australia")
val resList = List("FAILED","PASSED","PASSED","FAILED")
val semisMissedList = list1 diff list2
val modifiedMissingItemsList = semisMissedList.map(item => (item,"SKIPPED"))
val finalList = list2.zipAll(resList, "NR", "NR").toList
val finalResList = finalList ::: modifiedMissingItemsList ::: list0 ::: list3



//val listCombo = list.combinations(2)
//println(listCombo.getClass.getName)
